Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Failure Mode Tests - 10 Comprehensive Tests

Implemented 10 failure mode tests that validate error handling and system resilience:

1. Outcome Vectors Write Failure - Validates escalation infrastructure
2. Budget Race Condition - Confirms PostgreSQL locking prevents concurrent budget overruns
3. Concurrent Metadata Updates - Tests last-write-wins semantics
4. Malformed LLM JSON Response - Validates JSON parsing error handling
5. Database Connection Failure - Tests graceful degradation
6. GitHub Webhook Race Condition - Tests webhook handling when PR number missing
7. Invalid State Transition - Tests state machine transitions
8. Aider Command Failure - Validates execution failure handling
9. Sentinel Webhook Invalid Auth - Tests signature validation logic
10. Stuck Work Orders Detection - Tests monitoring query for >24hr old work orders

Test Infrastructure:
- Created vitest.config.ts with test environment setup
- Created src/lib/__tests__/setup.ts for .env.local loading
- All tests execute full logic (not just graceful skips)
- Tests create actual database records and validate real behavior
- Proper cleanup in afterEach to prevent test pollution

Results: 10/10 tests passing in 3.18s

Phase 3 Success Criteria Met:
âœ… All 10 failure mode tests passing
âœ… Tests validate escalation creation
âœ… Tests validate graceful degradation
âœ… Tests validate no crashes on failure
âœ… Budget race condition prevention verified

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
